channel.title: Biology on LiaScript
channel.description: Recent content in Biology on LiaScript

item.title: Fischbestimmer - FISHIDENTIFIER
item.description: This is an experiment of porting the FISHIDENTIFIER from the Deutsches Meeresmuseeum Stralsund to LiaScript. The original version can be found at: https://www.ostsee-fischbestimmer.de/en/bestimmer This port was done on the basis of the German version, but it was possible to translate the entire functionality into LiaScript. Visit the Fischbestimmer Usage About 80 species of fish regularly occur in the Baltic Sea. Roughly the same amount of species occasionally enters as vagrants from the the North Sea or via discharging rivers.
